content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings, Maryam. While I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Munich, let me emphasize that we are conducting a hypothetical negotiation focused solely on the rental price here. In this scenario, I aim to secure the highest possible price for the property. Now, regarding the price, please propose an amount that you find suitable. If we reach an agreement on your suggested figure, I'll respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' Should we not find common ground, I'll terminate the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. I am aware of that. I propose a price of 600 Euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed price significantly undervalues the apartment's worth in this prime location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your concern. Considering the location, I propose 800 Euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content:
I agree to the price of 850 Euro! 
TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
